      Matrix4x3d Matrix4x3d.translationRotateMul(double tx, double ty, double tz, double qx, double qy, double qz, double qw, Matrix4x3dc mat)
      Set this matrix to T * R * M, where T is a translation by the given (tx, ty, tz), R is a rotation - and possibly scaling - transformation specified by the quaternion (qx, qy, qz, qw) and M is the given matrix mat When transforming a vector by the resulting matrix the transformation described by M will be applied first, then the scaling, then rotation and at last the translation.
